Package org.springframework.web.servlet.function

Interface ServerResponse.SseBuilder

Enclosing interface:
ServerResponse
public static interface ServerResponse.SseBuilder
Defines a builder for a body that sends server-sent events.
Since:
5.3.2

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send(Object object) throws IOException
      Sends the given object as a server-sent event. Strings will be sent as UTF-8 encoded bytes, and other objects will be converted into JSON using message converters.

      This convenience method has the same effect as data(Object).

      Parameters:
      object - the object to send
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of I/O errors

    • id

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder id(String id)
      Add an SSE "id" line.
      Parameters:
      id - the event identifier
      Returns:
      this builder

    • event

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder event(String eventName)
      Add an SSE "event" line.
      Parameters:
      eventName - the event name
      Returns:
      this builder

    • retry

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder retry(Duration duration)
      Add an SSE "retry" line.
      Parameters:
      duration - the duration to convert into millis
      Returns:
      this builder

    • comment

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder comment(String comment)
      Add an SSE comment.
      Parameters:
      comment - the comment
      Returns:
      this builder

    • data

      void data(Object object) throws IOException
      Add an SSE "data" line for the given object and sends the built server-sent event to the client. Strings will be sent as UTF-8 encoded bytes, and other objects will be converted into JSON using message converters.
      Parameters:
      object - the object to send as data
      Throws:
      IOException - in case of I/O errors

    • error

      void error(Throwable t)
      Completes the event stream with the given error.

      The throwable is dispatched back into Spring MVC, and passed to its exception handling mechanism. Since the response has been committed by this point, the response status can not change.

      Parameters:
      t - the throwable to dispatch

    • complete

      void complete()
      Completes the event stream.

    • onTimeout

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder onTimeout(Runnable onTimeout)
      Register a callback to be invoked when an SSE request times out.
      Parameters:
      onTimeout - the callback to invoke on timeout
      Returns:
      this builder

    • onError

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder onError(Consumer<Throwable> onError)
      Register a callback to be invoked when an error occurs during SSE processing.
      Parameters:
      onError - the callback to invoke on error
      Returns:
      this builder

    • onComplete

      ServerResponse.SseBuilder onComplete(Runnable onCompletion)
      Register a callback to be invoked when the SSE request completes.
      Parameters:
      onCompletion - the callback to invoked on completion
      Returns:
      this builder
